mapper.sql: id, name, userId, region_id, acl, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT f.bucketName, objectMaxSize, objectMinSize, usedCapacity, objectCount, d.objectAverageSize FROM ( SELECT b.NAME AS bucketName, max( size ) AS objectMaxSize, min( size ) AS objectMinSize, SUM( size ) AS usedCapacity, count( file_id ) AS objectCount FROM `object_info` a LEFT JOIN bucket_info b ON a.bucket_id = b.id WHERE is_dir = 0 AND b.NAME IS NOT NULL GROUP BY bucket_id ) f LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bucketName, objectAverageSize FROM ( SELECT b.NAME AS bucketName, cast( AVG( size ) AS DECIMAL ) AS objectAverageSize FROM object_info a LEFT JOIN bucket_info b ON a.bucket_id = b.id WHERE is_dir = 0 AND size > ( SELECT min( size ) FROM object_info ) AND size < ( SELECT max( size ) FROM object_info ) GROUP BY bucket_id ) c ) d ON d.bucketName = f.bucketName
